scripts.native: yarn build && cd apps/expo && yarn start
scripts.web: yarn build && cd apps/next && yarn next
scripts.web:prod: yarn workspace next-app build && yarn workspace next-app serve
scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude next-app -pi run build
scripts.upgrade:tamagui: manypkg upgrade tamagui && manypkg upgrade @tamagui && manypkg upgrade tamagui-loader
